016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.requestlogpublisher;
017
018import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.Configuration;
019import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.InstanceConfiguration;
020import com.exoreaction.xorcery.log4jpublisher.LoggingMetadata;
021import com.exoreaction.xorcery.metadata.Metadata;
022import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.api.WithMetadata;
023import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.api.client.ClientConfiguration;
024import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.api.client.ReactiveStreamsClient;
025import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode;
026import jakarta.inject.Inject;
027import org.eclipse.jetty.server.Server;
028import org.glassfish.hk2.api.PreDestroy;
029import org.jvnet.hk2.annotations.Service;
030import org.reactivestreams.Publisher;
031import org.reactivestreams.Subscriber;
032
033@Service(name = "requestlogpublisher")
034public class RequestLogPublisherService
035        implements PreDestroy {
036
037    @Inject
038    public RequestLogPublisherService(ReactiveStreamsClient reactiveStreams,
039                                      Server server,
040                                      Configuration configuration) {
041
042        RequestLogConfiguration requestLogConfiguration = new RequestLogConfiguration(configuration.getConfiguration("requestlog"));
043        RequestLogPublisher requestLogPublisher = new RequestLogPublisher();
044        reactiveStreams.publish(requestLogConfiguration.getSubscriberURI().orElse(null), requestLogConfiguration.getSubscriberStream(),
045                requestLogConfiguration::getSubscriberConfiguration, requestLogPublisher, RequestLogPublisher.class, new ClientConfiguration(requestLogConfiguration.getPublisherConfiguration()));
046
047        JsonRequestLog requestLog = new JsonRequestLog(new LoggingMetadata.Builder(new Metadata.Builder())
048                .configuration(configuration)
049                .build(), requestLogPublisher);
050        server.setRequestLog(requestLog);
051    }
052
053    @Override
054    public void preDestroy() {
055
056    }
057
058    public static class RequestLogPublisher
059            implements Publisher<WithMetadata<ObjectNode>> {
060
061        private Subscriber<? super WithMetadata<ObjectNode>> subscriber;
062
063        @Override
064        public void subscribe(Subscriber<? super WithMetadata<ObjectNode>> subscriber) {
065            this.subscriber = subscriber;
066        }
067
068        public void send(WithMetadata<ObjectNode> event) {
069            subscriber.onNext(event);
070        }
071    }
072}
